TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AssemblyDelaySignAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class AssemblyDelaySignAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class AssemblyDelaySignAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定在建立組件時該組件並未完整簽署。

span.span: Specifies that the assembly is not fully signed when created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在組件上使用這個屬性時，會保留空間，以便稍後填入如 Sn.exe 公用程式的簽署工具簽章。When this attribute is used on an assembly, space is reserved for the signature which is later filled by a signing tool such as the Sn.exe utility. 會使用延遲簽署組件作者沒有私密金鑰會用來做為中產生簽章，存取權時`[assembly:AssemblyDelaySignAttribute(true)]`。Delayed signing is used when the author of the assembly does not have access to the private key that will be used to generate the signature, as in `[assembly:AssemblyDelaySignAttribute(true)]`. 中的類別`System.Runtime.CompilerServices`編譯器僅供使用。The classes in `System.Runtime.CompilerServices` are intended for use by compilers only. 請勿使用它們除非您正在建置編譯器。Do not use them unless you are building a compiler. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱通用語言基礎結構 (CLI) 文件，尤其是 < 磁碟分割 II： 中繼資料定義和語意 >。For more information, see the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics". 您可以線上取得這份文件；請參閱 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和通用語言基礎結構標準](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)，以及 Ecma International 網站上的[標準 ECMA-335 - 通用語言基礎結構 (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用屬性附帶。The following code example shows the use of the attribute with the . 若要編譯此範例中，您必須建立名為 TestPublicKey.snk 使用強式名稱金鑰檔[Sn.exe （強式名稱工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/sn-exe-strong-name-tool.md):To compile this example, you must create a strong-name key file named TestPublicKey.snk using the [Sn.exe (Strong Name Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/sn-exe-strong-name-tool.md): ```console sn -k TestPublicKey.snk ``` 編譯為.dll 的範例。Compile the example as a .dll. 如果您從命令列編譯時，使用`/t:library`選項 C# 或 Visual Basic 或`/LD`Visual c + + 連結器選項。If you compile from the command line, use the `/t:library` option for C# or Visual Basic, or the `/LD` linker option for Visual C++. [!code-cpp[AssemblyDelaySignattribute#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyDelaySignAttribute/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyDelaySignattribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyDelaySignAttribute/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AssemblyDelaySignattribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyDelaySignAttribute/vb/source.vb#1)]
